titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress to support the decision of the United States Court of Federal Claims to award public safety officer death benefits to the family of Christopher Nicholas Kangas, a 14-year old volunteer apprentice firefighter who died as a result of serious injuries sustained en route to assist in fighting a fire.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 3/30/2006--Introduced. Expresses support for the decision of the U.S. Court of Federal Claims to grant public safety officer benefits to the family of Christopher Nicholas Kangas, a 14-year old volunteer apprentice firefighter who died from injuries sustained en route to a fire.
